DOC.brief_summary: The study investigate impact implementation surgical checklist mortality 30 day 90 day surgery . Patients schedule elective surgical procedure ( exclude cardiac surgery ) last least 15 minute eligible . Surgery perform single tertiary care center . The study open trial intervention ( implementation checklist `` safe surgery save lifes '' ) .
DOC.criteria: elective surgery general regional anesthesia last > 15 min urgent / emergent surgery
